document_data.name: Inner Audience Chamber
document_data.mainbody: The '''Inner Audience Chamber''' was a location within [[Castle Waterdeep]].
document_data.Location: The Inner Audience Chamber was within Castle Waterdeep.
document_data.Structure: There was at least one hidden tunnel leading out.
document_data.History: [[Mirt the Moneylender]] visited the Inner Audience Chamber in early [[Flamerule]] of {{yearlink|1355}}{{cite book/Elminster in Hell/Hardcover 2001|2|Realmslore}} to warn [[Piergeiron]] that someone was slaying the [[Lords of Waterdeep]], only to find the Open Lord's daughter, [[Aleena]], impersonating him. After she explained Piergeiron had already been attacked and nearly slain, they fled through a secret passage.
